title: (x) Handwritten script on Passport Health website - Handwriting {Patricia}
content:
Any idea what the handwritten font is on this page?

[http://www.passporthealthco.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20110703012752/http:/www.passporthealthco.com/ "http://www.passporthealthco.com/")

thanks-  
Eric
author: ericw

comments.content:
I know this font. It is unhelpfully called "Handwriting" and I don't have any foundry info on it. Obviously if you enter that into a search engine you get too much.

Some more info: it's by Sam Wang, you can find a sample here (it's on the left), and they say you can download it but I found the instructions confusing. It's a shareware font.

[http://www.graphic-design.com/Type/Fonts-Fonts/scripts/handwrite.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20110703012752/http:/www.graphic-design.com/Type/Fonts-Fonts/scripts/handwrite.html "http://www.graphic-design.com/Type/Fonts-Fonts/scripts/handwrite.html")

Thanks!

The instructions are confusing....Hopefully I'll figure it out and be able to download it.

thanks again!!

I'm guessing you sign up to download here:

[http://www.graphic-design.com/PubWarehouse/](http://web.archive.org/web/20110703012752/http:/www.graphic-design.com/PubWarehouse/ "http://www.graphic-design.com/PubWarehouse/")
I agree that the other handwriting fonts are much nicer, but I have to create a folder in the design style of there website, which I did not do, so I am ckind of stuck with it.

I'm the owner of the Passport Health site and have the font if you still need it. Email me and let me know:  
 [jr@passporthealthco.com](mailto:jr@passporthealthco.com)
